data.comment: Today's referee, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo, has blown to start the match.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 4, Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
Orbelin Pineda (Cruz Azul) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 8, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Cruz Azul drives forward and Elias Hernandez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, In Santiago de Queretaro Cruz Azul drive forward through Santiago Gimenez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Santiago de Queretaro, Fernando Madrigal (Queretaro) misses the target with a header.
Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Queretaro to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio La Corregidora.
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Queretaro.
In the minute 21, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Throw-in for Queretaro close to the penalty box.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Cruz Azul at Estadio La Corregidora.
Kevin Ramirez is on target to give Queretaro a 1-0 advantage.
Great play from Angel Sepulveda to set up the goal.
In the minute 30, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Cruz Azul.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 33, Throw-in Queretaro.
Cruz Azul's Orbelin Pineda misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Santiago de Queretaro.
In the minute 35, Jonathan Rodriguez for Cruz Azul drives towards goal at Estadio La Corregidora. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Cruz Azul.
In the minute 36, Free kick Queretaro.
Adrian Aldrete (Cruz Azul) has received a yellow card from Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santiago de Queretaro.
In the minute 38, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
In the minute 43, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Queretaro needs to be cautious. Cruz Azul have an attacking throw-in.
Santiago Gimenez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Cruz Azul.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
In the minute 45, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Cruz Azul advance rapidly upfield but Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo blows for offside.
The first-half is over at Estadio La Corregidora.
In the minute 45, Jonathan Rodriguez (Cruz Azul) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Queretaro throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio La Corregidora.
Queretaro have a goal kick.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 51, Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio La Corregidora.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Cruz Azul.
Queretaro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Queretaro attack but Julian Velazquez's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santiago de Queretaro.
In the minute 54, Cruz Azul drive upfield and Juan Escobar gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Queretaro defender.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Important block from the Queretaro defence as Santiago Gimenez fires in a strike for Cruz Azul.
In the minute 54, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro's Irving Zurita is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, Throw-in high up the field for Cruz Azul in Santiago de Queretaro.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the home team a throw-in.
Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of Cruz Azul.
Queretaro are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 63, The away team replace Elias Hernandez with Ignacio Rivero.
Yoshimar Yotun is replacing Luis Romo for Cruz Azul at Estadio La Corregidora.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
In the minute 65, Free kick Queretaro.
Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
In the minute 69, Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cruz Azul's Santiago Gimenez breaks free at Estadio La Corregidora. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Queretaro have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Cruz Azul.
Angel Sepulveda (Queretaro) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
In the minute 71, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Queretaro's half.
Cruz Azul have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 73, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 75, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Sebastian Sosa is on a sub for Hugo Silveira for Queretaro.
Throw-in Cruz Azul.
The away team have replaced Adrian Aldrete with Misael Dominguez. This is the third substitution made today by Robert Siboldi.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
In the minute 79, Cruz Azul make their fourth substitution with Milton Caraglio replacing Santiago Gimenez.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 80, Alex Diego is making the team's second substitution at Estadio La Corregidora with Omar Islas replacing Angel Sepulveda.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Queretaro.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 83, Erik Vera for Queretaro has been booked by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
In the minute 86, Cruz Azul's Yoshimar Yotun gets in a shot on goal at Estadio La Corregidora. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Cruz Azul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
In the minute 87, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 89, Cruz Azul's Ignacio Rivero gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Santiago de Queretaro.
Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Queretaro.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Cruz Azul.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Santiago de Queretaro.
Sebastian Sosa returns to the field for Queretaro after picking up a slight injury.
Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
That's full-time at Estadio La Corregidora. The final score is 1-0.
Jonathan Borja is replacing Rafael Baca for the away team.
Sebastian Sosa is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
